newsitem.title: USA: HFS says PHH merger waiting period expires.
newsitem.headline: HFS says PHH merger waiting period expires.

text.p: PARSIPPANY, N.J., Dec 30 (Reuter) HFS Inc said the waiting period under the Hart-Scott-Rodino antitrust act has expired for its $1.7 billion merger with PHH Corp.
As a result, the companies will merge in March as previously announced if their shareholders approve the deal, HFS said.

HFS owns car rental system Avis Inc and is a franchisor of hotels and residential real estate brokerage offices. PHH delivers outsourcing in areas that include vehicle leasing and maintenance, real estate and mortgage banking.
